option.name: initiate
option._long: Start arranging windows in a grid for choosing one to switch to.

option.name: initiate_all
option._short: Initiate window picker for all windows
option._long: Start arranging windows from all workspaces in a grid for choosing one.

option.name: speed
option._long: Sets the duration of the animation in milliseconds.

option.name: spacing
option._long: Amount of empty space to leave between windows.

option.name: inactive_alpha
option._long: Set the opacity value of the inactive windows.

option.name: workspace_switch_threshold
option._long: Switch to a new workspace if fewer percentage of selected view's area is visible on the current workspace than this.
